page.title: 14PLYMSTOCK LIBRARY
page.content: { The{library}was opened on Nov 19th 1965.It lends its service to Plymstock and areas around.The library is used most by young people and is fullest on Saturdays and after school.It has a micro,linked to Plymouth Central Library and 2{microfiches. There are 30 different sections from art to travel. The library also has tapes and free newspaper.There are 3 main sections reference, non fictional and fiction. 6_7000 books are issued each week giving some idea of the number of users. Of the people interviewed most liked the library but say it could be bigger and have a more varied range of books. Their tastes range from War to murder. Out of all the sections, fiction is used most.
